name: good-rod
effect: Used to find Pokémon on the Good Rod list for an area, which are generally mediocre.
short_effect: Used to catch Pokémon in bodies of water.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A decent fishing
rod for catching
wild POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A decent fishing
rod for catching
wild POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A new, good-quality fishing rod.
Use it by any body of water to 
fish for wild POKéMON.

Use it by any body of water to fish for
wild aquatic Pokémon.
